rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. Each row forms two 6-digit numbers, read left-to-right and right-to-left. Each column forms two 6-digit numbers, read top-to-bottom and bottom-to-top. Each number outside the grid indicates the rank of the 6-digit number from the corresponding direction, starting from the smallest.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. Each row forms two 6-digit numbers, read left-to-right and right-to-left. Each column forms two 6-digit numbers, read top-to-bottom and bottom-to-top. Each number outside the grid indicates the rank of the 6-digit number from the corresponding direction, starting from the smallest.
